definitions.body: [[וִיַּעֲשׂוּ הִלּוּלִים]] Ju Jdg 9:27 i.e. a vintage-rejoicing, merry-making, connected with thanksgiving [[וַיׇּבאׁוּ בֵּית אֱלֽהֵיהֶם]] etc. (i.e. god baal-Berith, see v:Jdg 9:4).
of praise to ´[[י]], ´[[פקדֶשׁ ה]] Le 19:24 (H) holiness of praise, i.e. a consecrated thing in token of thanksgiving for fruit, offered in 4th year (cf. NH).
